document_data.title: Dragon Annual 2
document_data.edition1: <!-- leave blank if there is only one -->
document_data.mainbody: '''''Dragon Annual 2''''' was published by [[TSR, Inc.]] in December of 1997.  It contained the following articles related to the [[Forgotten Realms]]:
document_data.[[Bazaar of the Bizarre]]: Magical Cups:
: ''By [[Oren Schnurr]], illustrated by [[Chris Adams]].'' '''p. 16-20'''
Here are some cups and flasks to hold that brew that is true. {{Drasup|1997/Bazaar of the Bizarre: Magical Cups and Flasks}}
document_data.[[The Dragon's Bestiary]]: Arctic Monste:
: ''By [[Belinda G. Ashley]], illustrated by [[Catherine Burnett]].'' '''p. 32–38'''
Your heroes will find only cold comfort in the clutches of these monsters. {{Drasup|1997/The Dragon's Bestiary: Arctic Monsters}}

* [[Crystal skeleton]]
* [[Growler]]
* [[Snow spider]]
* [[Tundra lizard]]
document_data.Dungeon Mastery: Talk of the Town:
: ''By [[Lloyd Brown, III]], illustrated by [[Susan Van Camp]].'' '''p. 40'''
What happens between adventures is often the talk of the town.
document_data.[[Ecology]] of the Shambling Mound:
: ''By [[Johnathan M. Richards]], illustrated by [[Valerie Valusek]].'' '''p. 48-52'''
A scholarly treatise on the [[Shambling mound|Shambling Mound]]. {{Drasup|2/Ecology of the Shambling Mound}}
document_data.[[Rogues Gallery]]: Finder's Band:
: ''By [[Jeff Grubb]] and [[Kate Novak]], illustrated by [[Rags Morales]].'' '''p. 54-57'''
The characters from ''[[Finder's Bane]]'' and ''[[Tymora's Luck]]''. {{Drasup|1997/Rogues Gallery: Finder's Band}}
document_data.The Magic of [[Myth Drannor]]:
: ''By [[Ed Greenwood]], illustrated by [[Jim Crabtree]].'' '''p. 88-94'''
Spells and magical items from the Ancient Realms.
document_data.Pox of the Planes:
: ''By [[Ed Bonny]], illustrated by [[Chris Adams]].'' '''p. 100–111'''
Night hags, their wares, and their servants. {{Drasup|1997/Pox of the Planes}}
